node.title: 02- How to Live a Consecrated Life
node.description: Our second podcast features Mark Finley in conversation with Shauna Chung and Esther Louw. In this inspiring interview, Mark Finley shares insights, gleaned from a life of ministry and evangelism, on how to live a consecrated Christian life. He answers questions such as: How do I know if my Christianity is genuine? What does surrender look like? What role do emotions play in my conversion experience? We encourage you to tune in and learn answers to some of life’s biggest problems.
